content: Is there a way to remove the columns in a DataFrame row, that are equal to 0?

This can mean many things in DataFrames:

  • are you talking about any column, or a specific column
  • is 0 numeric, or string
  • are you talking about any row for the column is 0, or all rows for column are 0

Once you decide on the above, RTM on DataFrames for:

  • how to select by column
  • how to delete a column
